review: Amazing device. I use this more than my roku. Thats probably bc I have android phone
author: IluvTofu

review: Works fine for 2.4 GHz wireless, but will not work for 5.3 GHz. When I upgraded my router this product became completely useless for me. Make sure you have an older router.
author: Kindle Customer

review: My last one completely quick after 14 months. Called, Goggle. Warranty was 12 months. Had to buy a new one.
author: John C. Balcom

review: Love this thing. Makes watching TV another enjoyable experience (especially if you're a cord cutter). Can stream from phone, tablet, laptop, desktop you name it! Traveling to hotels, beach homes, and cabins becomes easier with the kids when you have this little piece of magic.
author: Bill Lancaster

review: Great player. Don't think replacing it with a cheaper alternative. Not worth
author: Manuel Aparicio Guzman

review: Best purchase I have made, It's really easy to use and very practical.
author: José Carlos González

review: This is basically a glorified Netflix and Youtube player. Cant cast from the Chrome browser on my iphone or ipad. Connection is laggy at best. Tried to return the item and i have to pay 12 dollars to return it.  Thats half of what i paid for it. Basically its a 25 dollar paper weight now.  Would not buy!
author: Jeremy Puglisi

review: Ordered for family members and they love it! Dropped their cable service
author: Alice Horrell
